name: Stylish Simple - Update 03.10 - No Ads
description:
A really simple style, just to clean-up the appearance. See additional info.
05.03 Update - Changed a few details, style looks polished now.
additional_info:
Features:

Update:
->Text have a soft shadow.
->Font is at 14px now.
->Text are all-small-caps now.
->All items are soft rounded.
->Input search box, drop-down menus and buttons are blue.
->Ads removed
->A minor spacing adjustment in the footer.

*Background as soft grey;
*Container max width is now at 100%;
*Fonts are changed to: 
  -Gill Sans
  -Gill Sans MT
  -Calibri
  -sans-serif (fallback)
*Fonts are in all-small-caps.
*Links are in blues.

Known issues:

No issue detected.
